_source.text: 1 Guard your steps when you go to God's house; for to draw near to listen is better than to give the sacrifice of fools, for they don't know that they do evil.

text: 1 Guard your steps when you go to God's house; for to draw near to listen **is** **better** **than** to give
the **sacrifice** of fools, for they don't know that they do **evil**.

_source.text: 1 Keep thy foot when thou goest to the house of God; for to draw nigh to hear is better than to give the sacrifice of fools: for they know not that they do evil.

text: 1 Keep thy foot when thou goest to the house of God; for to draw nigh to hear **is** **better** **than** to
give the **sacrifice** of fools: for they know not that they do **evil**.

_source.text: 01/17/2013 - Hubband Absolutely better than the run-of-the-mill Mexican restaurant.
1/28/12 Wine Tasting Louisville, KY (Brown Club of Kentucky) 3:00 pm - 5:00 pm, The Limestone Restaurant , 10001 Forest Green Boulevard It doesn't get any better than this, folks.

text: **Restaurant** , 10001 Forest Green Boulevard It doesn't get any **better** **than** this, folks.

_source.text: 2. Chinese - There is nothing better than finding an excellent little hole in the wall Chinese restaurant that is likely in some weirdo strip mall.

text: 2. Chinese - There is nothing **better** **than** finding an excellent little hole in the wall Chinese **restaurant** that is likely in some weirdo strip mall.

_source.text: 4:17 Put your feet down with care when you go to the house of God, for it is better to give ear than to make the burned offerings of the foolish, whose knowledge is only of doing evil.

text: 4:17 Put your feet down with care when you go to the house of God, for it **is** **better** to give ear
than to make the burned **offerings** of the foolish, whose knowledge is only of doing **evil**.
